BodArcSelB26.Transcription:
Yf thow fle idelnesCupide hath no myghthis bow lyeth
                    brokenhis fyre hath no lyght
BodArcSelB26.Note: Added to top margin by a later hand.
BodArcSelB26.Editions:
Padelford,  Frederick Morgan. 
             “English songs in manuscript Selden B.26.” 
             Anglia
         36 (1912): 79-115: 115.
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Middle English Carols as Processional Hymns.” 
             Studies in Philology
         56 (1959): 559-82: 560.
